message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $750,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your position, but I need to recoup a significant portion of the value I've placed on this product.  I'm willing to come down to $800,000, which is my absolute minimum.  Let's close this deal and avoid further negotiation.
